title.rendered: Senior Officer / Assistant Manager/ Deputy Mananger / Manager

content.rendered:
Sales & Marketing

Designation

Senior Officer / Assistant Manager/ Deputy Manager / Manager

Job Location

Ahmedabad, Delhi, Mumbai

Qualification

B.E Civil/Dip Civil, MBA in marketing (Would be an added advantage)

Comunication Skills

Excellent communication in Hindi & English, Gujarati/ Marathi (As per Region)

Experience

i) Experience in Sales Profile for minimum 2 – 6 years.
ii) Experience in Direct Product sale / Sales in Industrial / Govt Segment would be an added adavantage.

Job Profile

  • To visit Industrial projects, Contractors, Consultants, Govt Dept to promote the products.
  • To achieve sales target.
  • To present products at higher authorities.
  • To generate inquiries by regular visits.
  • To appoint Stockiest.
  • To follow up with clients for day to day Sales activities.
  • To collect payment for the sales generated.
  • To handle the Sales of the received orders.
  • To coordinate with various departments.

Skills Required

  1. Must possess very good Interpersonal & Presentation skills
  2. Tech Savvy , having a good knowledge of SAP would be an added advantage
